tool_description: Identifies potential nutrient deficiencies by comparing soil test results against crop-specific nutrient requirements and optimal growing conditions.

soil_test_results.description: Array of nutrient concentrations in ppm format

nutrient_names.description: Names of nutrients corresponding to test results

growth_stage.description: Current or planned growth stage (seedling, vegetative, flowering, fruiting)

yield_goal.description: Target yield goal in bushels/acre or tons/acre

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: soil_test_results and nutrient_names must have the same number of elements.
Invalid nutrient concentrations: All test result values must be non-negative numbers.
Unrecognized nutrient names: Use standard nutrient abbreviations (N, P, K, Ca, Mg, S, Fe, Zn, Mn, Cu, B).
Missing crop information: Specify a valid crop type for accurate deficiency assessment.
Invalid growth stage: Use seedling, vegetative, flowering, or fruiting.
Invalid yield goal: Yield goal must be a positive number if specified.
usage: Provide soil_test_results array with corresponding nutrient_names array, plus crop_type. Optionally specify growth_stage and yield_goal for targeted recommendations.

deficient_nutrients.description: List of nutrients below optimal levels

sufficient_nutrients.description: List of nutrients at adequate levels

excessive_nutrients.description: List of nutrients at potentially harmful levels

deficiency_severity.description: Overall severity assessment (low, moderate, high, critical)
